thread.title: Burin drug bust sees 11 people arrested, 5 charged
thread.title_full: Burin drug bust sees 11 people arrested, 5 charged

author: cbc
title: Burin drug bust sees 11 people arrested, 5 charged
text:
The RCMP said an ongoing investigation on the Burin Peninsula resulted in 11 people being arrested, with five being charged for drug trafficking charges.
On Feb. 17 police executed a search warrant on a house and executed two traffic stops in Marystown, and found a "quantity" of prescription medications oxycodone, codeine and lorezepam.
Two men and a woman face charges of possession for the purposes of trafficking.
Police said the two separate traffic stops resulted in more arrests, with eight other unnamed individuals taken into custody.
The Burin RCMP said the investigation is continuing and it expects more charges will be laid.
